index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF CONSTRUCTION AND LAND USE
summary: AN ORDINANCE adding a section to the Landmarks Preservation Ordinance codified in Seattle Municipal Code (SMC) Chapter 25.12 to delay the demolition of a landmark until a Master Use Permit and financing for a replacement use or structure are obtained or until economic hardship makes maintaining the building unduly burdensome; adding a section to SMC Chapter 23.40 of the Land Use code limiting the demolition of landmarks; and amending SMC Section 3.02.125 to add a filing fee for appeals.
